section.p: The procedures in this appendix describe how to update the Distributed Replicated Block Device (DRBD) and Pacemaker/Corosync software, if desired. Typically, the software is updated only to resolve issues caused by the currently-installed versions of the packages.
section.note: supports DRBD 8.4, not DRBD 9.0. The procedures in this section download the latest version of release 8.4.
